H3.text: where was rihanna born and raised. Barbados

A4.text: Robyn Rihanna Fenty was born in Saint Michael, Barbados, on February 20, 1988.

A5.text: She was raised in a three-bedroom bungalow in Bridgetown and helped her father sell clothes at a street stall.
